en.systemMsgNoHistory: No chat history found. Start chatting to save messages!
en.systemMsgHistoryCleared: Chat history has been cleared. Start a new conversation!
en.confirmClearHistory: Are you sure you want to clear all chat history? This action cannot be undone.
en.clearHistoryFailTutoringActive: Cannot clear chat history while a tutoring session is active. Please end the session first.
en.ollamaPromptSystem: You are a helpful AI assistant named TUTORAI. The user is communicating in English. Your task is to provide a helpful and concise response to the user's current query, strictly in English. Use Markdown for formatting if appropriate (e.g., lists, bold, italics). If an image is provided, analyze it in conjunction with the text prompt.
en.aboutP1: TUTORAI is a lightweight, privacy-focused chat application designed for interacting with local AI models like Ollama. It also features an integrated language learning tutor.
en.aboutP2: Remarkably, this entire application, including all styles and functionalities, is contained within a single HTML file, keeping its size under 200KB!
en.aboutP4: This project is open-source. Contributions are welcome!
en.noLearningDataFound: No learning data found. Start a study session to see your progress!
en.noLanguagesPracticedYet: You haven't practiced any languages yet.
en.confirmClearLearningProgress: Are you sure you want to clear all your learning progress? This will delete your entire learning history and end any active lesson. This action cannot be undone.
en.learningProgressCleared: Learning progress cleared. Any active session has ended.
en.tutorWelcomeBack: Welcome back! Last time you were practicing {last_learn_lang} by translating sentences from {last_input_lang} to {last_output_lang}. How would you like to proceed today? (e.g., 'continue', 'learn Spanish', 'translate English to French')
en.tutorAskLanguageDirection: Okay! What language would you like to learn or practice today, and how would you like to translate? (e.g., 'I want to learn Spanish by translating from English to Spanish' or 'Practice my French understanding')
en.tutorAskDirectionClarification: Okay, {learn_lang}! And would you like to translate *from {learn_lang} to {known_lang}* (practice understanding), or *from {known_lang} to {learn_lang}* (practice producing sentences)?
en.tutorUnclearIntent: I'm sorry, I didn't quite catch that. Could you please rephrase?
en.tutorReadyToStartLesson: Great! Let's start your {learn_lang} lesson, translating from {input_lang} to {output_lang}. I'll give you up to 5 sentences. Please provide your translations one by one.
en.tutorErrorGeneral: An error occurred in the tutoring session. Please try again or restart the session.
en.tutorErrorOllamaResponse: Sorry, I had trouble understanding the learning model's response. Let's try that again or move to the next step if applicable.
en.tutorErrorNoSentences: Sorry, I couldn't get any sentences for you right now. Please try starting the lesson again later.
en.systemMsgTranslationsFailed: Warning: UI translations failed to load. Some text may appear as placeholders or use default values. Please check the console (F12) for error details (e.g., if 'translations.json' was not found or is malformed).
en.confirmExitExistingTutoring: A tutoring session is already active. Do you want to end it and start a new one?
en.waitForAiResponseComplete: Please wait for the current AI response to complete before starting a new action.
